page.title: 13Pastimes in Hemsworth 3
page.content: {Jogging} Jogging has become very popular. A lot of people are taking up running for exercise and they go to keep fit classes to prepare for their running. First of all they will start to jog on the roads steadily for about a mile, then they will increase their distance gradually. Some people then become interested in running and train for and enter races; others may enter marathons but you need to be very fit for this. I enjoy running in races and training for them and I also like to watch others race. My favourite runner is Steve Cram.
